name: FINIGARD 105
description: FINIGARD 105 is a specially formulated organo-mineral liquid concentrate. It is used to impart increase corrosion protection and torque tension modification to parts processed with Coventya FINIDIP or LANTHANE conversion coatings. Developed to meet the demands of the automotive industry, FINIGARD 105 protects zinc and zinc alloy finishes against corrosion in a variety of environments.
